definition: to make up missed lesson/to reschedule a class
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: We seldom have a holiday. It is out of humanity to make up the fucuking missed lessons.
sentences.chinese: 難得放假，卻讓我們補課補得死去活來，真不人道。

sentences.english: So I want to find a teacher to teach him at night.
sentences.chinese: 張叔叔想給孩子找教師在晚上補課。

sentences.english: The teacher helped his pupils make up the lessons they had missed.
The teacher helped his pupils make up the lesson they had missed.
sentences.chinese: 我們不提倡週末給學生補課。

sentences.english: School vacation gives a student remedial teaching , where should report an offence to?
sentences.chinese: 學校假期給學生補課，該向哪裏舉報？

sentences.english: She was always too busy to eat a meal in order to give students extra lessons.
sentences.chinese: 她總是顧不上喫飯休息，走村串戶地給同學們補課。

sentences.english: Back to school after must endure brawn limit of toil stop makes up a missed lesson.
sentences.chinese: 回到學校後又得忍耐膂力極限的辛勞停止補課。

sentences.english: That is, after school, but also to the backward students extra lessons.
sentences.chinese: 那就是放學之後還要給後進生補課。

sentences.english: In case of class cancellations, make-up lessons will be not arranged.
sentences.chinese: 如課堂因天雨取消，本會將不會安排補課。

sentences.english: The children cheated. They said they were going to a rescheduled class, but they played computer games instead.
sentences.chinese: 這幫孩子暗渡陳倉，說是補課竟然去打遊戲了。

sentences.english: No make up class will be arranged for classes cancelled due to bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 因天氣惡劣而取消之課堂將不設另行補課。

sentences.english: And teachers also helped him to catch up with his classes.
sentences.chinese: 他出院後，老師還爲他補課。

sentences.english: We regret that no make-up class can be arranged for the Summer Program.
sentences.chinese: 所有暑期課程將不會安排補課或退款。

sentences.english: Students will not be allowed to make up work missed during unexcused absences.
sentences.chinese: 學生曠課期間所缺課程學校不負責補課。

sentences.english: I makeup back, I let my thirst ice on a frozen.
sentences.chinese: 我補課回來，我就冷凍一個冰塊讓我解渴。

sentences.english: Yes. Tom will help me with them this evening.
sentences.chinese: 是的，湯姆晚上會幫我補課。

definition: to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to attend school as a day student
to finish class/to get out of class
to overdose on supplementary medicine/to cram too hard
time of going to work/the morning rush hour
